TopicTitle: Space Stations - For those who make 'em.

Articles.Content:
Space stations, what do we think? Do you make them at all? Do you use mods to put them into orbit? Do you build them in orbit with mods? Totally stock? Specialist parts?

Suggestion: To get into the mood for this thread, simply play this video here. (this is not mandatory, but it's always good fun)

Here's my first ever space station, it's totally stock and was launched into orbit in one go. My computer had it's sad-face on.

So, do you have any awesome space stations? Let's see them!

This is the best station I have made, I went with an ISS-type design.

Edited August 16, 2012 by ddavis425
You guys have great space stations... Seriously. That's the coolest stuff I've EVER seen in KSP. Vostok, I'm stealing your design
Here's mine
Vostok, that is the best stock space station ever. Stealing it!
Wow these are all cool but vostok with Stock its just amazing i dident think that was even possible (Then again i have some pretty bad design issues)
Threw this together this evening.

Here's the Kerbalnational Space Station:

[ATTACH=CONFIG]31328[/ATTACH]

These stations are all looking awesome! What mod is the space station parts you all seem to be using?

Recently, I flew a crew transfer flight to my station, rendezvousing with it in it's daftly inclined orbit (I forgot to correct that before separating the engine) and exchanged the generic kerbal crew for Bill, Jeb and Bob. So now my station is crewed by the best of 'em!
this thread has some pretty good contenders, but remember: we're in the big leagues now, hold nothing back

this thread has some pretty good contenders, but remember: we're in the big leagues now, hold nothing back

Uh... What? So the thread is now a competition? You've turned a nice little thread about people sharing space stations into "I bet I can make one better than you." Nobody is a contender....
you took that way to seriously...

This is my first station, so, don't judge me too harshly, okay?

I decided to go simple and do a Skylab-Salyut sort of single module station...

(The opposite being, going all "Mir on its soul"

http://imgur.com/a/T9owk#0
Are there any mods for TransHab inflatable modules for Kerbals? I liked the TransHab idea as soon as I read about it.

Are there any mods for TransHab inflatable modules for Kerbals? I liked the TransHab idea as soon as I read about it.

Sure is, look at the BACE pack in the Silisko Industries thread.
All of your designs put mine to shame. It's my first one, though.
Here's my 5 minute Space Station. There are currently 6 Kerbals but it has room for 11 Kerbals. It is in a geosynchronous orbit. 3 Kerbals entered it during a space rendezvous.
Awesome thread. There are a lot of things i can do in ksp, designing awesome stations is NOT one if them.

I just made this small space station. It is now in a 200km orbit of Kerbin.

(I am sorry if I did this wrong, this is my first time attaching pictures to a post.)

Please can we have the craft file?

Edited March 25, 2017 by Malandirix

I've got one too:

I use it as my desktop image, all parts are from Kosmos pack.

My first attempt at a station, Olympus. I was sick of only using Bill, Jeb, and Bob all the time, so I built them a home in the sky. It lags a little, which makes EVA from it difficult, and it had to use MechJeb to successfully get into orbit because of the lag, and because it tilted horribly while the SRBs were burning. Even with MechJeb, it barely made it.

(apologies, don't know the spoiler code in the new forum)

Edited August 21, 2012 by Ted
Added spoiler.
Wow Vostok, thats the most amazing stock space station I've seen yet, it is much better looking than mine Nice job!

My first attempt at a station, Olympus. I was sick of only using Bill, Jeb, and Bob all the time, so I built them a home in the sky. It lags a little, which makes EVA from it difficult, and it had to use MechJeb to successfully get into orbit because of the lag, and because it tilted horribly while the SRBs were burning. Even with MechJeb, it barely made it.
